name: buddy.me
description:
buddy.me is a purpose-driven connections app that helps people find meaningful accountability partners around 
shared habits, goals, or challenges. It’s not a social feed or a dating app — it’s a system for structured support. 
Through intent-based UX, and shared roadmaps, buddy.me pairs users based on aligned effort, not algorithmic guesswork. 
The platform is being built with a strong focus on clean architecture, modular design systems, and a principled UX 
philosophy that prioritizes clarity, and mutuality — ideal for devs and designers who care deeply about experience, 
semantics, and systems that serve real human needs.

name: Snapflow
description: Snapflow is a cloud-based photo printing workflow that allows users to upload, process, and print photos, with automated tracking and customer notifications.

name: CICD Pipeline
description: The CICD Pipeline automation project provides an automated infrastructure deployment solution for AWS Lambda functions using the AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) with Go. It streamlines the process of building, packaging, and deploying Lambda functions through AWS CodeBuild integration.
